definition: surname Zhu/abbr. for 天竺[Tian1 zhu2] India (esp. in Tang or Buddhist context)/Buddhism (archaic)

sentences.english: I went out to water the geraniums.
The lemon geranium sloughs dry brown leaves at the base of its branches.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬天竺葵枝條底部棕色的枯葉會脫落。

sentences.english: 2 compound, Geranium oil, three times daily with skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 複方香葉天竺葵油，每日塗皮損處三次。

sentences.english: Grains of pollen on a geranium stigma .
sentences.chinese: 天竺葵柱頭上的花粉顆粒。

sentences.english: I love fish pelargonium, excel other any flowers, especially gules .
sentences.chinese: 我愛天竺葵，勝於其他任何花，尤其是紅色的。

sentences.english: A girl of about my age was standing beside a pot of geraniums.
sentences.chinese: 在一罐天竺葵旁，站着一個與我年齡相仿的女孩。

sentences.english: The fragrance of perfume geranium suits a kitchen very much, can stomachic .
sentences.chinese: 香水天竺葵的香味很適合廚房，能增進食慾。

sentences.english: Lemongrass, orange and geranium, a perfect combination to relax your body.
sentences.chinese: 香茅，鮮橙和天竺葵的完美融合，放鬆身心。

sentences.english: What do you do to your geraniums to keep them blooming in the winter, Mary?
sentences.chinese: 你會怎麼做你的天竺葵，讓他們在冬季開花，瑪麗？

sentences.english: I have another place in my garden where the geraniums thrive all year round.
sentences.chinese: 我還有一個地方是我的花園，而天竺葵興旺一年四季。

sentences.english: Out of geraniums and unsmelled flowers.
sentences.chinese: 來自天竺葵和沒被嗅過的花。

sentences.english: He nipped off the side shoots from his geraniums .
sentences.chinese: 他掐掉天竺葵側邊上的花。
